title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: The dry dirt and dusty rocks are signs of the arid climate.  The air is crisp, lacking the moisture of the mist-covered valley below.  The sea of fog strangely and abruptly stops just a few feet below this ledge, along with the calm and stillness surrounding it.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
